Package com.ceng453.game.controller

Class LevelController

java.lang.Object
com.ceng453.game.controller.LevelController
public class LevelController extends Object
Controller class for Level 1, 2 and 3. This class includes commonly used methods for these levels

      public static void dealCard​(Hand player, Deck deck, Hand opponent)

      deck - Deck instance
      opponent - Hand instance of opponent

    • startGame

      public static void startGame​(Deck deck, Random random, Pile pile, Hand threeCard)
      This method selects and puts 3 closed and 1 open card to pile
      Parameters:
      deck - Deck instance
      random - Random instance
      pile - Pile instance
      threeCard - Hand instance of threeCard

    • controlPishtiCases

      public static int[] controlPishtiCases​(javafx.scene.Node c, int playerCardCount, Pile pile)
      This method controls the Pişti cases, such as playing Jack or same rank card with the top card of pile
      Parameters:
      c - Last played Card
      playerCardCount - Total number of cards from the turns won by the player
      pile - Pile instance
      Returns:
      Last round winner and Player's total Card Count

    • loseInfo

      static void loseInfo​(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rec, javafx.scene.control.Label info1, javafx.scene.control.Label info2, javafx.scene.control.Button resultButton)
      This method shows lose information to the player
      Parameters:
      rec - Rectangle, which includes Labels and Button
      info1 - Label, which includes message about losing
      info2 - Label, which includes message about losing
      resultButton - Button for going Dashboard

    • winInfo

      static void winInfo​(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rec, javafx.scene.control.Label info1, javafx.scene.control.Label info2, javafx.scene.control.Button resultButton, String resource, String routePage)
      This method shows winning information to the player
      Parameters:
      rec - Rectangle, which includes Labels and Button
      info1 - Label, which includes message about winning
      info2 - Label, which includes message about winning
      resultButton - Button for going next Level
      resource - name of fxml file, which is next Level
      routePage - name of route Page

    • showFirstClosedCards

      static javafx.scene.layout.Pane showFirstClosedCards​(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane level1pane, javafx.scene.layout.HBox threeCards)
      This method shows first three closed cards to user, if user win first turn
      Parameters:
      level1pane - Pane instance of Level 1
      threeCards - HBox instance for showing 3 cards
      Returns:
      newly created Pane

    • lastTurnCalculation

      static Long[] lastTurnCalculation​(int lastRoundWinner, Pile pile, int playerCardCount, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pileCards)
      This method calculates points of players after the last turn in round
      Parameters:
      lastRoundWinner - Winner of the last turn
      pile - Pile instance
      playerCardCount - Total number of cards from the turns won by the player
      pileCards - StackPane instance of pile
      Returns:
      player score and opponent score

    • opponentCardSelection

      static int opponentCardSelection​(Random random, javafx.scene.layout.HBox opponentCards, Pile pile)
      Parameters:
      random - Random instance for selecting card randomly
      opponentCards - HBox instance of opponent Cards
      pile - Pile instance
      Returns:
      index of opponent card, which will be played

    • tableInitializer

      static int tableInitializer​(javafx.scene.layout.HBox opponentCards, javafx.scene.layout.HBox playerCards, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pileCards, javafx.scene.control.Label roundLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label opponentScoreLabel, javafx.scene.control.Label yourScoreLabel, int round)
      This method initialized the table graphically
      Parameters:
      opponentCards - HBox instance of opponent Cards
      playerCards - HBox instance of player Cards
      pileCards - StackPane instance of pile Cards
      roundLabel - Label instance for showing round count
      opponentScoreLabel - Label for showing opponent's score
      yourScoreLabel - Label for showing player's score
      round - Round count
      Returns:
      round count

    • opponentWinning

      static int[] opponentWinning​(Pile pile, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane pileCards, int lastRoundWinner, int firstRoundWinner)
      This methods handles the case, where opponent wins the turn
      Parameters:
      pile - Pile instance
      pileCards - StackPane instance for pile cards
      lastRoundWinner - winner of last turn (0 for opponent, 1 for player)
      firstRoundWinner - winner of first turn (0 for opponent, 1 for player)
      Returns:
      winner of last turn and winner of first turn

    • playerTwoCards

      static int[] playerTwoCards​(javafx.scene.layout.HBox playerCards, javafx.scene.Node c, Pile pile, int lastRoundWinner, int playerCardCount, Random random)
      This method handles the case, where player played a card, there are only 2 two cards in pile. Method calls controlPishtiCases method
      Parameters:
      playerCards - HBox instance for player Cards
      c - Player card, which is played last
      pile - Pile instance
      lastRoundWinner - winner of last turn
      playerCardCount - Total number of cards from the turns won by the player
      random - Random instance for rotating the last card in pile randomly
      Returns:
      winner of last turn and total number of cards from the turns won by the player

    • opponentWinning

      static int opponentWinning​(Pile pile, javafx.scene.Node c, int lastRoundWinner)
      This method handles the case opponent played card and there're only 2 cards in pile.
      Parameters:
      pile - Pile instance
      c - Last played card by opponent
      lastRoundWinner - winner of last turn
      Returns:
      winner of last turn
